Name: Description
dielectric_parameter_water: Dielectric fit parameter alpha for ions in water

Name: Reference
dielectric_parameter_water: A. Zuber, L. Cardozo-Filho, V.F. Cabral, R.F. Checoni, M. Castier, An empirical equation for the dielectric constant in aqueous and nonaqueous electrolyte mixtures, Fluid Phase Equilib. 376 (2014) 116-123.

Name: Comment
dielectric_parameter_water: Independent of temperature, pressure, ionic strength
